title: I forgot what font I used....silly me!!!
content:
I created my logo about 3 years ago for my jewelry site and since that time have done a couple of repavings of my computers. I cannot find what font this is. I have tried using the online sites that can identify fonts but nothing even comes close. Please help me in determining what font I used. Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125207im_/http:/typophile.com/files/foxdencreationslogo2_5751.png)

Font: 

 Verticalization 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125207/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [foxdencreationssig.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125207/http:/typophile.com/files/foxdencreationssig.jpg) | 17.38 KB |
author: foxdenvixen

comments.content:
It's called **Verticalization** and the copyright says:  
"1999 - R.Gast - GreyWolf WebWorks (formerly DarkSide Productions)"
OMG!!!! Thank you so much!!! I found the font and have downloaded and installed it and my graphics program recognizes it!!!
